item.title: No, AI won't replace software engineers. Here is why
item.description: Since AI and LLMs, one of the main statements I’ve been reading is: ‘AI will take programmers job’. Here is why I don’t think that will happen.

item.title: Fuck your memory-safe language, write actual fucking code
item.description: You’re focusing too much on the tool, and not on the outcome.
